title: My CEO in Disguise
overview: Gao Feng, the mastermind behind a top financial empire, retreats from the spotlight to work as a delivery driver. Hired by CEO Su Qingyan to pose as her fake husband, he hides a jaw-dropping secret: he's the head of the Junsheng Group! Bound by a paper marriage, Gao Feng covertly uses his real power to rescue his "wife" from crises. Sparks fly between the unlikely pair, and as love quietly blooms, Su Qingyan begins unraveling the truth about the deliveryman……
